job_history.work_description: Manage Consulting Services Group Money Manager reconciliations. Control National Sales revenue & expense accruals and deferral. Manage Litigation reserves and Legal accruals. Supervise month end close, balance sheet reconciliations, variance analysis and audit requests. Coordination of projects and production issues with FA Compensation Information Technology. Organization & implementation of new product within FA Compensation Dept. Redefined & improved SOX controls and implemented self assessment of these controls. Administer all FA Compensation security entitlements. Manage Financial Advisor Trainee Compensation. Managed team of 3 of professionals.
Strengthened company's controls by managing the implementation of introducing broker to single broker dealer.

Review Amortization entries processed for Special Compensation & Deferred Compensation Programs. Balance sheet review and sign-off for Special Compensation loans & Deferred Compensation awards. Prepare Department Sarbanes Oxley control document and associated Risk Controls Assessment matrix. Team project leader in the conversion of Compensation feeds to new People-soft platform. Maintain general ledger payroll accounting department mapping table. Work with Payroll Systems Support Team on service requests for any GL system modifications.

job_history.role_name: Intermediate Accountant - Account Executive Compensation Dept
job_history.work_description: Generated and analyzed gross commission revenue reports for senior management. Was responsible for calculation of Branch Manager Incentive Compensation (MIC). Monthly analysis of general ledger entries to identify and resolve variances from preceding months. Administered the organization of a complete procedures manual for the department.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Over 30 years of experience in managing financial aspects, including revenue and expense accruals, litigation reserves, and financial advisor trainee compensation, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in general ledger accounting, payroll accounting, and financial reporting, including preparation of gross commission revenue reports and analysis of general ledger entries, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.explanation: Managed teams of professionals in various roles, including Senior Manager and Vice President positions, indicating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated projects and production issues with IT teams, and led team projects, such as the conversion of compensation feeds to a new platform, showing strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Generated and analyzed gross commission revenue reports, and performed monthly analysis of general ledger entries to identify and resolve variances, indicating strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Implemented and managed risk controls, including SOX controls, and performed risk assessments, showing strong proficiency in risk management.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Maintained payroll accounting department mapping table, and worked with payroll systems support team on service requests, indicating strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
